<div class="header-box">

  <div class="header-sub">A clear, expert written personalised plain language summary of orthopaedic illness and treatment options— from home, without delays.</div>

<section>
  <div class="section-title">Why Get an Expert Explanation?</div>
  <p>Medical terms can feel confusing or overwhelming. When you receive an orthopaedic diagnosis, understanding it clearly helps you make confident decisions. A plain-language summary breaks down medical words, explains what the condition truly means, and gives you clarity without fear or uncertainty.</p>
</section>

<section>
  <div class="section-title">Why not AI?</div>
  <p>An expert summary is better than an AI-generated summary because a real doctor understands your medical problem in a deeper, human way. A specialist knows how symptoms fit together, what details are important, and which explanations will actually make sense to you. They can spot mistakes, consider your age, activity level, and background, and explain things gently so you don’t feel scared or confused. AI can only repeat information from the internet, but an expert uses years of training and real patient experience to give you a clear, accurate summary that is safe, personalised, and trustworthy.
</p>
</section>

<section>
  <div class="section-title">When This Service Helps Most</div>
  <ul>
    <li>You received a significant or complex orthopaedic diagnosis.</li>
    <li>You want to understand a condition before surgery or major treatment.</li>
    <li>You want to understand a surgical treatment in simple language.</li>
    <li>Your doctor’s explanation felt unclear or too technical.</li>
    <li>You want expert insight without having to travel.</li>
  </ul>
</section>
